title: Social Domain Job Competency Enhancement through Mobile-Based Situated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational theories and practical experience in social fields
context.additional_context: Learners receive tablet devices to perform real-time online sessions and field-linked tasks, emphasizing workplace-applicable mobile learning activities

learning_goals: Learners can solve three real-world social studies problems encountered in workplace settings using a situational learning model via mobile devices.
Learners achieve 85 points or higher (out of 100) on achievement assessments after tablet-based "here-and-now learning" activities.
Learners demonstrate a positive attitude with an average of 4.0 or higher on a 5-point scale in mobile learning environment preference surveys.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
